title: `apply_action` should update `page.status`

labels.name: forms
labels.description: Stuff relating to forms and form actions

body:
### Describe the bug

https://github.com/sveltejs/kit/blob/a404e63cafc4cac13aa2b4b8bf51574352e8982e/packages/kit/src/runtime/client/client.js#L1205-L1210

`page.status` not updated, so `$page.data` contains irrelevant values.

Example case:
1. return `invalid(400)` from action (status 400) => `$page.status === 400`
2. return `{}` from action (status 200) => `$page.status === 400`

### Reproduction

https://github.com/dmkret/sveltekit-page-status-form-action
https://stackblitz.com/edit/sveltejs-kit-template-default-uahxzt?file=src/routes/+page.svelte

1. Press `Produce 400`. This calls `return invalid(400)`
2. `$page.status` = 400, expected = 400 ✅
3. Press `Produce 200`. This calls `return {}`
4. `$page.status` = 400, **expected = 200** ❌

### Logs

_No response_

### System Info

```shell
System:
    OS: macOS 12.5.1
    CPU: (12) x64 Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700B CPU @ 3.20GHz
    Memory: 342.25 MB / 16.00 GB
    Shell: 5.8.1 - /bin/zsh
  Binaries:
    Node: 18.9.0 - /usr/local/bin/node
    Yarn: 1.22.18 - /usr/local/bin/yarn
    npm: 8.19.1 - /usr/local/bin/npm
  Browsers:
    Chrome: 105.0.5195.125
    Firefox: 104.0.2
    Safari: 15.6.1
  npmPackages:
    @sveltejs/adapter-auto: next => 1.0.0-next.76 
    @sveltejs/kit: next => 1.0.0-next.488 
    svelte: ^3.44.0 => 3.50.1 
    vite: ^3.1.0 => 3.1.3
```


### Severity

annoyance

### Additional Information

my current workaround without patching sources is to return `invalid` in valid case

```js
export const actions = {
    default: () => {
        // return {}
        return invalid(201, {})
    }
}
```
